mapper.sql: "ID" as "id" ,"DOCUMENT_NO" as "documentNo" ,"ITEM_NO" as "itemNo" ,"TO_DEPT" as "toDept" ,"LEND_DATE" as "lendDate" ,"ITEM_CODE" as "itemCode" ,"ITEM_NAME" as "itemName" ,"ITEM_SPEC" as "itemSpec" ,"LEND_AMOUNT" as "lendAmount" ,"UNITS" as "units" ,"RETURN_AMOUNT" as "returnAmount" ,"RETURN_DATE" as "returnDate" ,"RETURN_MAN" as "returnMan" ,"RETURN_FLAG" as "returnFlag" ,"OPERATOR" as "operator" ,"LENDER" as "lender" ,"MEMOS" as "memos" ,"ANTI_FEE" as "antiFee" ,"ANTI_FEE_SUM" as "antiFeeSum" ,"ANTI_DATE" as "antiDate" ,"EXP_DOCUMENT_NO" as "expDocumentNo" ,"NOBACK_FEE" as "nobackFee" ,"REQ_DATE" as "reqDate" ,"REQ_OPERATOR" as "reqOperator" ,"OPERATOR2" as "operator2" ,"ORG_ID" as "orgId"
